page.title: 18LIFESTYLES - TOURISM
page.content: The village is located in the Cotswolds" area of outstanding natural beauty" but attracts few tourists, except to the pub(see p.17). 61 residents provided details of their own holidays in the past 12 months. This reveals an interesting range of {lifestyles. }20 had no holiday away from home, 21 had one holiday, 15 had two and 5 had three. This gives a total of 66 holidays of which 33 were in the U.K. and 33 abroad.Cornawll(10) Devon(7) and Wales(7) were the leading holiday destinations and only one was within Gloucestershire. Apart from U.S.A.(3) and Tunisia(1) the overseas holidays were within Europe. France(10) and Greece(7) dominate and only three were not "Mediterranean". Out of 10 over 65 year olds only 2 had holidays.
